text: ya ye kahane lago ki agar ham par kitaabe (khuda naazil hotee to ham un logon se kaheen badhakar raahe raast par hote to (dekho) ab to yaqeenan tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se tumhaare paas ek raushan daleel hai (kitaabe khuda) aur hidaayat aur rahamat aa chukee to jo shakhs khuda ke aayaat ko jhuthalae aur usase munh phere unase badh kar zaalim kaun hai jo log hamaaree aayaton se munh pherate hain ham unake munh pherane ke badale mein anaqareeb hee bure azaab kee saza degen (ai rasool) kya ye log sirph usake muntizar hai ki unake paas pharishte aaen
